audioText: Les syndicats croient que les négociations aideront le peuple travailleur à obtenir de meilleures conditions de travail.
question: What do the unions believe the negotiations will help with?
options: Help working people get better working conditions
Help employers reduce their operational costs significantly
Help government officials understand industry regulations better
Help local communities develop new recreational facilities
explanation: The correct answer is 'Help working people get better working conditions'. The text states 'Les syndicats croient que les négociations aideront le peuple travailleur à obtenir de meilleures conditions de travail' - The unions believe that the negotiations will help working people get better working conditions. 'Aideront' is the future tense of 'aider' (to help), 'peuple' means 'people', and 'travailleur' means 'working/worker'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - labor negotiations context
